titles: Observations on the poems of Homer and Virgil a discourse representing the excellencies of those works; and the perfections in general, of all heroick action. Out of the French, by John Davies of Kidwelly.

author: Rapin, René, 1621-1687.
Davies, John, 1625-1693.

notes: A translation, by John Davies, of the Rapin, René. Comparaison des poèmes d'Homere et de Virgile.
Running title reads: Observations upon Homer and Virgil.
